mapper.select: select a.biz_cd ,a.inbound_req_dt ,a.inbound_req_no ,a.center_cd ,a.customer_cd ,c.customer_nm ,a.supplier_cd ,d.supplier_nm ,a.inbound_type ,a.inbound_exp_dt ,a.remark ,b.inbound_req_seq ,b.item_cd ,e.item_nm ,b.exp_dt ,b.make_dt ,b.make_lot_no ,b.price ,b.qty ,b.sub_remark ,c.customer_cd ,c.customer_nm from t_inbound_req a left join t_inbound_req_item b on a.biz_cd = b.biz_cd and a.inbound_req_dt = b.inbound_req_dt and a.inbound_req_no = b.inbound_req_no left join t_customer c on a.biz_cd = c.biz_cd and a.customer_cd = c.customer_cd left join t_supplier d on a.biz_cd = d.biz_cd and a.customer_cd = d.customer_cd and a.supplier_cd = d.supplier_cd left join t_item e on a.biz_cd = e.biz_cd and a.customer_cd = e.customer_cd and b.item_cd = e.item_cd where a.biz_cd = #{bizCd} and a.center_cd = #{centerCd} and a.inbound_req_dt = #{inboundReqDt} and a.inbound_req_no = #{inboundReqNo}
